highlights.sentence: I also do research in psychosis at Columbia University Medical Center.
I treat children, adolescents, and adults and enjoy working with families.
I treat children, adolescents, and adults and enjoy working with families.

statementSentences.sentence: Hello, I look forward to meeting and helping you.

I have an interest in wellness and approaching patients holistically, and will spend time trying to identify and treat any underlying biological and psychological factors that may be contributing to your current problems.
shannondelaneymd.com/about-us/ I graduated from the Medical College of Wisconsin, and completed my adult psychiatry residency at the Harvard Longwood Program.
I completed my child and adolescent psychiatry fellowship at Columbia/Cornell hospitals.
I also do research in psychosis at Columbia University Medical Center.
I treat children, adolescents, and adults and enjoy working with families.
My clinical interest is in treating all psychiatric conditions, including complicated diagnostic cases.
My treatment philosophy is an integrated approach which may include psychotherapy, medication, and/or complementary medicine approaches that have been proven safe and effective.
